words.source: H7200 (ra'ah, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to see'; KJV 'saw', ESV 'saw', NASB 'saw'
H3068 (YHWH, proper noun) the divine name; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H5493 (sur, Qal perfect 3ms) 'to turn aside'; KJV 'he turned aside', ESV 'he turned aside', NASB 'he turned aside'
H7200 (ra'ah, Qal infinitive construct with preposition lamed) 'to see/look'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'to see'
H7121 (qara', waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to call'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'called'
H413 ('el, preposition + 3ms suffix) 'to him'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'to him'
H430 ('Elohim, noun common mp absolute) 'God'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'God'
H8432 (tavek, noun common ms construct with preposition min) 'midst'; KJV 'out of the midst of', ESV 'from', NASB 'from the midst of'
H5572 (seneh, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'the bush'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the bush'
H559 ('amar, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to say'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'and said'
H4872 (Mosheh, proper noun) 'Moses'; repeated for emphatic direct address; KJV/ESV/NASB 'Moses'
H559 ('amar, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to say'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'And he said'
H2009 (hinneh, demonstrative particle + 1cs suffix) 'here I am/behold me'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'Here I am'
